questions.question: Considering the overall form, what is the dominant shape of this upholstered seating piece?
What seems to be the primary material used in the construction of the sofa's seating area?
Describe the color of the main upholstery fabric covering the sofa's cushions and body.
Observing the legs, what material appears to constitute their visible structure?
Based on visual inspection, what is the apparent texture of the sofa's upholstery?
How many visibly distinct seating cushions are integrated into the design of this sofa?
What is the general style of the sofa's legs; are they tapered, straight, or ornate?
Judging by the image, is there any visible pattern or design printed on the upholstery?
From the image, what is the visible color of the sofa legs?
Describe the visible seams; are they straight, decorative, or concealed?
Does the back of the sofa appear to be uniformly filled and smooth, or is there any visible quilting or tufting?
Are there any prominent buttons, studs, or other decorative elements on the visible surfaces of the sofa?
What is the apparent height of the sofa's back relative to its seat cushions?
Considering the wooden legs, describe their finish: glossy, matte, or distressed?
Does the sofa's frame appear to be visibly made from a different material than the legs?
